title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Welcome and introduction to the webinar. Sonia Burke, Customer Service Manager, and Jessica Simmons, Customer Service Specialist, greet attendees and explain the webinar will focus on exporting and printing features within the Premiere Plus and Connect Plus applications. Jessica will answer questions at the end, and attendees are encouraged to schedule group or individual training sessions if desired.

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Introduction to the exporting and printing demonstration within the Premiere Plus platform, noting that features also apply to Connect Plus users. Explanation that exporting and printing will be broken down into two steps, each with three search methods. The first option focuses on exporting and printing from a report using keyword or criteria search. Example given of searching a company via keyword search to access the company view and available print options.

metadata.topic: Exporting and Printing Overview and Company View Introduction

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Detailed explanation of printing options from the company view. Users can print company reports, contact details, inventory reports, and notes from collaboration tools, all in PDF format. The print feature below the company view allows exporting the company's inventory report to Excel. Export options include simple Excel export, contact details for mail merges, fractional ownership exports, and maintenance inspection exports. Printing offers a wide range of options, which will be further demonstrated with larger reports.

metadata.topic: Company View Printing and Exporting Options

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Demonstration of a broader keyword search example using the CJ2 market to generate a fleet report. This report includes all CJ2 aircraft regardless of sale status. Explanation of differences between keyword and criteria searches: criteria searches provide more detailed reports and allow multiple aircraft and territories in one report. Despite differences, print and export features function similarly for both search types.

metadata.topic: Fleet Report Generation via Keyword and Criteria Search

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: In-depth explanation of export features. Exporting always produces Excel files, while printing produces PDFs. Simple exports output visible screen data including customized columns. Mail merge exports provide contact information for marketing or prospecting. The export process involves selecting records, choosing companies and contact types (owner, broker, executive, hangar), and selecting contact details (email, phone, fax). Previewing exports shows company contacts associated with each aircraft. Two primary export types are simple data export and mail merge contact export.

metadata.topic: Detailed Export Features and Mail Merge Process

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Additional export options are presented, including fractional ownership exports showing share details and contacts, and fleet report exports that summarize multiple makes and models with production status, activity, and sale or lease status. Export to Outlook or CRM combines mail merge steps for easy mass mailer or CRM import. Maintenance inspection exports require selecting all records manually and provide inspection notes and completion dates. These export features apply equally to keyword and criteria searches.

metadata.topic: Advanced Export Options: Fractional, Fleet, CRM, and Maintenance Inspection

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Overview of print features for polished PDF reports suitable for client presentations. PDFs can include company logos, which can be added by contacting support if not visible. Print options include a list of aircraft, aircraft contact reports, full aircraft reports with detailed specs and transaction history, and lighter aircraft summary reports that omit sensitive transaction data but include key contacts and specs. These reports provide various levels of detail depending on presentation needs.

metadata.topic: Printing Features and Report Types with Company Logo Integration

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Explanation of summary and market scan reports as quick reference tools. The summary report provides essential aircraft data such as status, price, year, total time, certification, avionics, and compliance notes. The market scan report expands on notes, engine times, and programs, making it useful for sales or marketing teams new to the industry. Aircraft note exports allow printing of collaboration tool notes associated with aircraft. Additional options include exporting aircraft photos and managing custom print templates to tailor reports to specific needs.

metadata.topic: Summary and Market Scan Reports, Note Exports, and Custom Print Templates

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Demonstration of exporting and printing from the aircraft view. Users can access printing and exporting buttons for individual aircraft, including exporting aircraft valuation data in Excel or PDF formats. The aircraft valuation tool is accessible within the aircraft view, allowing export without leaving the window. Print options include full aircraft summary, transaction histories, valuation tool reports, notes, photos, and detailed market scan reports with interior and exterior notes. These features apply to both for-sale and not-for-sale aircraft.

metadata.topic: Aircraft View Exporting and Printing Including Valuation Tool Features

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Overview of additional exporting and printing options accessible through dashboard, favorites, and market buckets. The dashboard allows quick access to saved reports with full export and print functionality. Favorites provide easy access to saved aircraft, companies, contacts, and markets with printing features. The market bucket offers market summary reports for any aircraft make and model, useful for client presentations or onboarding new team members. These reports can be printed or exported with various productivity tools like performance specs and operating costs.

metadata.topic: Exporting and Printing via Dashboard, Favorites, and Market Buckets

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Introduction to Stat Pack reports, which include distribution by age, geography, for sale status, and sales history. Example shown with geography distribution for jets, featuring visual charts that can be exported to Excel or printed as PDFs. Additional productivity tools include model comparison, operating cost calculator, and spec comparison tools. These tools generate reports that can be exported to Excel or printed as PDFs, enhancing data analysis and presentation capabilities.

metadata.topic: Stat Pack Reports and Productivity Tools Exporting and Printing

title: Exporting and Printing
chunk_text: Summary and closing remarks. The most popular exporting features are simple exports and mail merges from keyword or criteria searches. Print features are valuable for client or team presentations and can include company logos. The webinar concludes with an invitation to attend the December webinar focused on dashboard utilization, including setup, widget understanding, and customization. Attendees are thanked and encouraged to reach out for further training or demos.

metadata.topic: Webinar Summary, Closing Remarks, and Upcoming Webinar Preview
